fields.title: Taggle Health - Senior Unity App Developer - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* Saigon, Vietnam (working remotely, Singapore based company)

## Salary Expectation

* Competitive

## Requirements

* Strong knowledge on OOP principles and design patterns
* Strong knowledge on Unity3D best practices and usage
* Experience in building game/app with Unity3d on mobile devices (iOS, Android) is a plus
* Experience in connecting Unity3D with wearables through Bluetooth is a plus
* Candidate must have good communication skills with positive attitude

## Skills

### Must Have

* Expert-level knowledge on Unity, its programing usage and patterns
* Keen eye on gamification and bring gaming to ordinary application

### Ideally

* At least 3 years working with Unity3D game engine
* Publish a few games/ mobile applications with Unity

## Responsibilities

We are looking for an experienced Unity3D developer who can be a part of our team. You must have experience writing games with Unity3D, well-versed in its usage patterns and strong background in programming in general.

### You'll be responsible for

* Together with the Vietnamese team design, develop our core digital health app
* Design, develop mini games that adds on to the core app
* Research and implement integration of health devices with games
* Work in a team and able to mentor junior members when needed

You will help create applications that take care of public's health and will be used widely in Singapore. Through gamification, these applications help elderly and patients to regain their health and have fun in the process.

## Why it would be awesome to work with us

* Flexible working environment. We value quality of our work not any admin procedure
* Fun and exciting digital health startup solving problems that will make life better for our clients
* Small team means you can explore different new technology and move faster

## Contact

Please include your other technical profiles (beside github) such as linkedin, stackoverflow, technical blog if available

Homepage: https://tagglehealth.com/  
Email: nathan@tagglehealth.com

fields.title: Rakuna - Senior Mobile App Developer - Hanoi / HCM - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* Hanoi, Vietnam
* HCM, Vietnam 

## Salary Expectation

* Competitive
* Negotiable based on experiences and skills

## Skills

* Strong background in mobile application development with significant cross-platform mobile engineering experience (3+ years) in iOS and Android
Expertise working on at least one large application and/or have released multiple apps (business and/or personal)
* Familiarity with mobile threading, memory management, MVC/MVVC concepts and how they apply to mobile applications
* Ability to develop effective UX solutions through user feedback loops, leveraging both quantitative and qualitative metrics
* Effective project management skills; creative problem-solving skills; strong communication skills

## Responsibilities

The Senior Mobile App Developer will be responsible for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a range of devices including mobile phones and tablet computers. You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure.

_Note: This position is open to all international candidates who are willing to relocate to our APAC office in Hanoi, Vietnam._ 

* Design, develop, and optimize mobile application
* Plan and implement complex new features and functionality, as well as entire applications end-to-end
* Consult on project goals (best practices, conversion, Usability, UI / UX)
* Work closely with developers and designers to create beautiful, functional solutions
* Handle multiple clients and internal projects simultaneously

## Why it would be awesome to work with us

* Work in a vibrant, diverse, multinational start-up team; Flexibility and high work ownership
* Ability and freedom to bring own idea to the table without discriminating or shutting one up
* Comprehensive Compensation and Benefits package
* Flexible work hours 
* Trained to be diverse in several areas or get to train others to become as skilled as you are. If you just know one area, before leaving, you will know several areas of your job you felt are not necessary or important
* Dress code ain’t no problem, just wear whatever you got
* Free lunch, frequent bonding events
* Company retreats twice a year
* Performance-based and negotiable salary that heavily depends on your skills (more details to be given during interviews)

## Apply

Send resume with a portfolio on past work to apply: https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/RAKUNA1/743999681453234-senior-mobile-app-developer

_Please include your other technical profiles (besides GitHub) such as LinkedIn, StackOverflow, technical blog if available._

Only qualified candidates will be contacted.

## Contact

Homepage: www.rakuna.co
Email: ly@rakuna.co (Ly - Talent Acquisition Coordinator)

fields.title: Sendo.vn - Senior IOS Developer - HCMC - FT
fields.description:
## Location
* District 7, Saigon, Vietnam
* Fulltime
* Sendo.vn is the online marketplace of FPT Group which connects buyers and sellers around the country. Originally an e-commerce project of FPT Online JSC, Sendo.vn was officially launched on Sept 2012. On May 13rd 2014, Sendo Technology JSC was founded as a member of FPT Group and is responsible for operating Sendo.vn marketplace.

* Up to now, more than 80,000 shops have been operating on Sendo.vn, offering a diverse range of products with over 5 million products from 21 different categories.

## Requirements
* At least 2 years working experience in iOS development.
* Have published one or more iOS apps in the app store.
* A deep familiarity with Objective-C and Swift.
* Good understanding about XCode project structure and Cocoa Touch.
* Experience working with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, - - Core Graphics and Core Text.
* Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
* Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.
* Good experience with UI & UX.
* Familiarity with JSON and REST-based APIs.
* Deliver product in time and high quality clean code.
* Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
* Plus:
Knowledge or experience with Google Flutter is a big plus: building application, plugins, packages, communicate between Native code.
Experience building iOS library.
Knowledge and experience with Unit Test, Continuous Integration ( CI ), Continuous Delivery ( CD ).

### Responsibilities
* Design and build Sendo application for the iOS platform.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
* Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
* Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* 13th month salary yearly, and 1-3 months extra bonus based on performance and company profit yearly
* Full social insurance & extra Insurance – FPT Care.
* Company Trip and Team building annually.
* Gift on special days like birthday, Tet and Holidays.
* Opportunities to work in Agile Environment.
* Office is located in District 7.
* Sport activities like Football/Badminton club.
* Training to develop our employees.
* 2 times of Performance Review every year to adjust Salary and title/position.

### Contact
Hong Ngoc Anh Thu - Recruiter
Email: thuhna2@sendo.vn
Skype: hongngocanhthu

fields.title: FinOS - Data Engineer - Hanoi - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* Hanoi, Vietnam
* Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* Negotiable

## Requirements
* Mastery of one of Python, or similar language.
* Experience with Relational databases or NoSQL databases.
* Proven understanding of the full software development lifecycle including testing, continuous integration, and deployment.
* Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills.
* Solid grasp of computer science fundamentals including data structures and algorithms.
* Understanding on machine learning techniques.
* Proven ability to evaluate and apply new technologies in a short time.
* Self-motivated, proactive, and solution-oriented.
* Experience with cloud platform services desired.

## Skills

* Python, Terraform, Docker, Git, R, AWS, ...

### Must Have

* Fluent in English and Vietnamese
* BS or MS degree in computer science or equivalent field.
* 2+ years Software Engineering experience

### Ideally

* Experience in building data science or data analysis tools a plus.
* Machine learning background a plus.
* Familiarity with Agile software development process, Test-Driven development and Continuous Integration a plus.
* Familiarity with DevOps tools such as Ansible and Terraform a plus.

### Responsibilities

With the large volume of data which we will be leveraging, our job is to build and maintain proper data processing solution to bring reliable experiences for our customers. If you’re interested in being a part of a team that’s constantly learning and problem-solving, we’d love to talk with you. As a Data Science Engineer, you work closely as part of a small setup in FinOS to lead the design and implementation of systems and tools to support the effort of FinOS. You will be: 

* Developing and implementing production backend system to serve data science prediction.
* Designing system and data architecture. 
* Working with partners to integrate systems. 
* Problem-solve and develop solution at the intersection of data and systems. 
* Innovating by recognizing opportunities for automation and tools improvements. 
* Providing technical leadership for a team of data scientists.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us

FinOS is the definitive platform for financial services that powers digital financial products & services across Southeast Asia. We pave the way to provide financial support to the unbanked through simple, affordable and tech-enabled financial products & services.

FinOS’ Data Science (DS) team is responsible for ensuring the company is well equipped with the skills and technology needed to improve, change and solve engineering problem involving system, integration, deployment and development. DS runs multiple environments using continuous integration and deployment practice. We work side-by-side with the business to define the technical requirements and with the data science team to implement scalable, production-ready API and infrastructure using best practices. We are seeking a customer-focused, passionate and driven Data Science Engineer with experience in developing Python-based API and cloud-based infrastructure.

### Contact
Jie Sheng (JS) / Ezekiel (Eze)
Email: chua.jie.sheng@finos.asia / ezekiel.tee@finos.asia
Telegram https://t.me/joinchat/AuYbJhVGdt2l7bTSahsUcg
Skype live: chuajiesheng@outlook.com

### Must Have

* Fluent in English and Vietnamese

### Ideally

* Good understanding of different types of databases and their relevant use cases

### Responsibilities

* Create, develop and own the APAC BI reporting and analytical environment
* Collaborate with the Data Engineer on the design, development and maintenance of data models
* Lead the development and provision of BI reporting through the deployment of self-service reports and dashboards

In this role, the Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst serves as the primary bridge through the business to communicate high-value information to support data-driven decision-making demands. The successful candidate must be able to roll up his/her sleeves and work directly with very large data sets and BI tools. He/she will be passionate about their work, detail-oriented, highly analytical and have excellent problem-solving skills.

fields.title: Freelensia - CTO/Rails Developer - Remote/Saigon - FT/PT
fields.description:
![rails hiring poster](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27481639/46718039-299a3c00-cc94-11e8-85f7-446f7c0b8311.png)

## About us
* [Freelensia](https://www.freelensia.com) is the world's first online interpreter reservation platform. Based in Vietnam, the website launched in March 2017 and now have more than 3000 interpreters from around the world. On Freelensia, interpreters post listings advertising their language skills, while companies browse and make a reservation online. We aspire to become the AirBNB for interpreters and are looking for a tech lead / CTO to realize our vision, or full-stack Rails developers to execute that vision.

## Location
* D7, Saigon, Vietnam (FT), or
* Remote (PT)

## Compensation
* $1000-1800/month with up to 10% equity for co-founders / CTO positions
* $10-$20/hour for PT

## Technical Requirements
* Full-stack mid to senior developer with at least 3 years of experience at top-tier startups or outsourcing companies
* Experience with: 
    * Rails 5.1.1 
    * React + jQuery
    * MySQL 5.7
    * Node.js 7.8
    * Testing frameworks (RSpec, Cucumber)
* Familiarity with AWS, S3, ability to set up and perform deployments preferred
* Familiarity of Clojure a big bonus

## Other requirements
* Can translate a business requirement into multiple technical solutions and explain the pros and cons of each
* Familiar with task management and chat program (Asana, Trello, Slack, etc.)
* Can break a task into sub-tasks, estimate required hours and completion date
* Disciplined and hard-working, do what it takes to complete a task on-time
* English is not required (you can practice your English as most of us are fluent, but not necessary)
* For FT: candidates living near D7 preferred

### Responsibilities
* Build and refine new features for our platform such as our interactive landing page, user profiles, search engine, reservation calendar, blog, payment, etc.
* Fix bugs, write tests
* Help recruit and train junior / freelancers

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* The very first FT tech position in a global-aiming startup
* Office in D7 with all of the greenies and fresh air
* A laid-back and simple culture: be bold, work hard, earn what you deserve and enjoy the show!
* You are encouraged to contribute your ideas to our vision, technical road map and implementation processes

### Contact
Homepage: freelensia.com
**How to apply: link.freelensia.com/careers-tech**

fields.title: Toripu - Frontend Web Developer - HCMC - FT
fields.description:
## Location
We are currently looking for an office space, but we will be located near or within District 1/2 of Ho Chi Minh City.

## Salary Expectation
* US$700 to US$1500+, depends on expected salary and experience.

## Requirements
- Proven track record of delivery of complex projects to build high-performance, high-reliability web services
- Familiarity with the whole web stack, web protocols, and web performance optimization techniques
- In-depth understanding of web frameworks
- Proficient understanding of the HTTP protocol
- Hands-on experience with network diagnostics, network analytics tools
- Basic knowledge of Search Engine Optimization process
- Strong analytical skills
- Prior experience of a travel based product startups is a plus.
- Passion for learning new things, solving challenging problems.

### Must Have
- Proficient with Javascript
- Solid Understanding of HTML5/CSS3, jQuery, and Responsive Design
- Detailed knowledge of minimum one modern JavaScript framework: React, Ember, Angular, Ruby on Rails, etc
- Ability to Get Stuff Done!
- Communication and presentation skills in English is a MUST, other languages are advantage

### Ideally
- Able to build websites from scratch using Rails/ ReactJS/ Laravel/ etc.
- Able to maintain websites and implement security and data protection.
- Have experience in integrating external libraries/ SDKs e.g. payment.
- Have some experience in business intelligence and data analytics.

### Responsibilities
- Design, build & manage web apps that impact millions of users in travel
- Ensure web apps are responsive on mobile and cross-browsers
- Design and implement RESTful APIs
- Build and deploy modern web applications e.g. React, Redux, Webpack, ES6, Flow and Typescript
- Deal with data visualisation and presentation
- Architect efficient and scalable backend systems
- Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues
- Implementation of security and data protection
- Contribute to the evolution of the technology, product and experience
- Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross-functional teams in a global environment

### You’ll be responsible for
- Building and maintaining Toripu websites
- Building and maintaining CRM/CMS

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
- No overtime. We respect work-life balance.
- We keep sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve.
- We value your commitment, ensuring biannual salary review based on your performance and results.
- We are a group of collaborative, driven, fast paced, innovative and passionate people.

### About Us
We are building Asia’s new, exciting and upcoming travel app. We connect travellers and drivers to bring better and more enjoyable travel experiences. We are planning to build web apps and mobile apps for our product.

The team in Vietnam is estimated to have 20+ manpower, including tech, business and finance teams.

At Toripu Pte Ltd, we are collaborative, driven, fast paced, innovative and passionate. We are looking for passionate people to join the pioneer team and lead their respective fields. 

Moreover, we believe in taking good care of our employees especially those with good working attitude. We value people who can get things done. Work hard, play hard. 

### Contact
Homepage: toripu.com

fields.title: TINYpulse - Full Stack Developer (All Levels) - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/19971922/16145378/71ae83c0-34a2-11e6-9694-3b97e45380dd.jpg)

TINYpulse is a mature startup with offices in Seattle (US) and Saigon (Vietnam). Our products help leaders at 1500+ companies, from small to large, grow happy and high performing employees. 

_Now in 2019, we're making many hires again and we hope you join a new cohort of talented and passionate engineers._

## Location

* Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary 

* $1000-$5000 matching experience and skills (based on our Career Path)
* Company stock options and health insurance/fitness benefits

## Requirements

* You want to be the best programmer you can be.
* You believe in writing tests, unit or integrated.
* You know Ruby or can pick up Ruby fast because you're already a polyglot.
* You love ORM but you are not afraid to look at raw SQL queries.
* You believe that fixing bugs is great to learn and hate making the same mistake twice.
* You know or can be trained on Agile methodologies fast
* You want to learn as much as you can from others, and want to share knowledge with others.
* [Senior] You love solving hard problems, such as re-architecting the application to support new features that the old assumptions no longer apply.

## Responsibilities

* Apply yourself to one or more engineering responsibilities in your team: develop and test new features, maintain and improve current system, upgrading systems, reducing technical debt, extracting modules, improving security, document your work, and contributing to open source when opportunities arise.
* Grow according to the career path at TINYpulse, from needing guidance to being able to self manage to being proactive to go the extra mile to contributing to technical leadership.

## Benefits & Perks

### A few basic bits on the environment you will be working in:

* About 50 people in Vietnam, who make up the product team that uses a mix of Scrum and Kanban
* About 60 people in Seattle working on sales, marketing and customer success
* Sharp, motivated co-workers in a fun, beautiful office environment with an amazing view of Saigon and the river

### Benefits

* Free laptop (Macbook Pro/ Window) that fits your need. iOS, Android testing devices.
* Unlimited vacation policy; work hard and take time when you need it.
* Full medical inpatient & outpatient/ dental/ maternity package to fit your and your spouse's' needs.
* All benefits followed Vietnamese labour law, including 13th month salary.
* Unlimited snacks & drinks in our bar, mini parties biweekly, followed with big events quarterly.
* Opportunity to travel to U.S. Build product that companies around the world are using to improve their employee's happiness.
* Training opportunities: continuing development of technical, soft skills, and English through both internal and external classes

### Contact

Attach your resume in our [application form](https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/tinypulsecom/view/P_AAAAAADAABIKTPK_Z8U6Ni) and submit.

fields.title: Judge.me - Full Stack Developer - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
[Judge.me](https://judge.me) is a bootstrapped, profitable and fast growing SaaS company. 

We build our own products that customers love, most notably the [Judge.me product review app](https://apps.shopify.com/judgeme) with over 750 five star app reviews and in active use by over 14000 ecommerce merchants. 

We are a growth miracle, growing organically and consistently doubling annually just by word of mouth with zero paid marketing. 

Our team of 15 strong is very international, with about half expats in our Saigon based product team and a globally remote support team on top of that. 

We've made a worldwide impact, with over active 14000 customer shops in 140+ countries, who altogether fulfill over 2.5 million orders every MONTH for which we generate over 200000 product reviews per month.

We are looking for Rails Full Stack developers to join our development team to improve and expand our products further.

## Location
* Saigon, Vietnam
* Fulltime
* Private studio office at [QSpace](https://qspace.io/)

## Salary Expectation
* Top of market: $800 - $2000+

## Requirements / Skills
* BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent
* Familiarity with our tech stack:
  - Ruby, Rails
  - PostgreSQL
  - CSS, HTML, Vanilla JavaScript
  - Concurrent processing with Sidekiq
  - Git, GitHub, GitHub flow
* Familiarity with coding standards and best practices
* 1+ years experience. Junior to middle Senior.
* Self-management and self-motivation
* Good enough English for Slack

### Ideally
* Good problem solving skills with understanding of data structures and algorithms
* Security and performance awareness
* Familiarity with more tech stack:
  - AWS services, e.g. EC2, EB, ES, S3
  - NodeJS, PHP, Python, Bash
  - Redis, MongoDB
* Experience with ecommerce platforms, e.g. Shopify, WooCommerce, BigCommerce
* Have an investment mentality, and want to build for the long term
* Great written and spoken English

## Responsibilities
* Assist in designing, developing, testing, maintaining and improving system
* Participate in product planning management discussions for better understanding of the company's products
* User oriented when delivering features and developer oriented when delivering codes
* Self-manage and deliver features without handholding

## Why it would be awesome to work with us
* We are a bootstrapped, profitable and growing SaaS company. We build our own products that customers love, we grow organically by word of mouth with little to none ads.
* Our team is small and growing steadily, your work will have significant impacts and be appreciated by customers and team members.
* We are diversified and international, with team members from all around the globe. 
* First hand experience with our customers. You can see thousands of ecommerce businesses, of all sizes and types, managing their businesses and learn from them.
* Flexible work hours - within reason. No overtime. No dress code, wear whatever you want (but wear something of course).
* Open work environment. Ideas and feedbacks are welcome and appreciated. Criticism is always blameless and constructive. We want ourselves to improve after all.
* Healthy codebase. Zero (or very few) WTF moments when onboarding to our codebase.
* Thorough and constructive code review. We will push ourselves toward and learn to write better codes together.

## What hard problems our company is trying to solve
* **Business**: We deliver real business results to ecommerce businesses of all sizes, with our super affordable tool delivering great ROI to customers by improving trust, generating reviews which improve conversion rates on product pages, and generating follow-up sales directly.
* **Technical**: One of the challenges is building web UI components that adapt on thousands of different websites. We call this as frontend at the 4th dimension. Issues, which are typically not obvious, are magnified at this level. Our coding, debugging, problem solving, structural thinking skills and our perception on the significance of coding standards will be boosted.
* **Performance**: at our moderate scale with millions of requests a day, albeit not as much as Google's or Facebook's, simple code can make considerable impact. We will learn when to break the conventions to tune for performance.
* **Email**: We send millions of emails each month on behalf of our customers. Our in-email review forms are on the cutting edge of front-end development which provides interesting challenges.

## Benefits
* 💰Base salary matching the best startups in Saigon
* 🚀Opportunities to grow: after some time at Judge.me senior developers can run entire topics/apps, lead small dev teams. and work their way up to **3000+** USD compensation
* 💪Premium medical insurance
* 🗽Flexible working hours (within reason)
* 🏖Flexible leave days. 2.5 leave days per month (including official holidays)

## Contact
* To apply, please send your CV, together with any profile of yours (e.g. LinkedIn. GitHub) to [careers@judge.me](mailto:careers@judge.me?Subject=Application%20for%20Full%20Stack%20Developer)
* About our team: https://judge.me/about

fields.title: AXON - Senior Manual QA Engineer - HCM - FT
fields.description:
## Location
* 8th floor, Etown Central, 11 Doan Van Bo, District 4, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
 
## Salary Expectation
* Competitive
 
## About Axon
 
![image](https://itviec.com/system/production/employers/logos/4066/axon-logo-170-151.png?1527066156)
 
Axon, an US product company, blends hardware, software, firmware, wearable technologies, artificial intelligence and innovation in one house. 
 
We strive to make the bullet obsolete and replace all police handguns with electronic devices. We also develop and manufacture in-car cameras and body-worn cameras that protect truth by capturing the scene, encrypting and watermarking the video while sending all the data up to the cloud in our SaaS platform that allows police, prosecutors, defense attorneys to view the evidence and see what happened when. 
 
Early in 2017, Axon acquired Misfit Computer Vision team and now we are expanding our investment and growing the office in all perspectives: Research & AI, Software development, Embedded & Firmware, Hardware.
 
Come work in an exciting environment in which you’ll use your passion, experience, and strong analytical skills to help bring new technologies to public safety and leave a positive impact on the world. We cultivate an environment that favors agility, initiative, and creative thinking. Our mission is to protect life, making the world a safer place through smart devices and software services. We genuinely love what we do and are looking for others who share this passion.

Our team has responsibility to provide testing services for multiple projects. We are now searching multiple QA Engineers who have passion in testing, creative thinking, carefully and dare to challenge yourself.
 
## Requirements
 
*Have minimum 5 years’ experience in software testing across a wide variety of applications and infrastructure components, QA processes, test management and automated testing tools.
*Solid understanding of software QA methodologies, tools and processes
*Experience in API testing (using SoapUI, Postman or similar)
*Familiarity with version control, bug tracking (Jira), and CI / CD systems (Teamcity or Jenkins).
*Strong communication skills in English and Vietnamese.
*A passion for quality.
 
## Skills
 
### Ideally

*Experience in Automation testing (using Selenium or Appium) is a plus
*Programming skills (Java, Python) is a plus
*Ability to collaborate, make questions and communicate directly with colleagues in US.

### Responsibilities
 
You will work closely with our talented team in Vietnam and US which you will be assigned to:
*Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and impactful feedback
*Develop and execute a manual test strategy where appropriate
*Use exploratory testing techniques to discover and prevent issues
*Produce detailed reports documenting test results and process to be provided to the *Product/Project Manager and QA Manager
*Track defects and issues using JIRA and participate in regular sprint and release planning sessions with the development team
*Implement and improve existing QA processes
 
**Your Impact**

Participate in planning, estimating and prioritizing processes to ensure successful execution of testing activities for all projects, you will help us continually improve the quality of our existing products.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
 
*  An awesome office/working environment with the latest technologies and work with top engineers in the world
*  Competitive salary and benefits including a great medical insurance plan for you and your family
* Free lunch, gym, phone stipend, parking
* Fun team activities and outings
* Flexible working hours
* Opportunities for training in the US
* Opportunities to ride along with real US police officers in real life situations, see them use technology, and get inspired
 
### Contact
 
Apply: https://bit.ly/2IpJnxi
or contact: Hien Ha (hha@axon.com)

fields.description:
## Location
* 8th floor, Etown Central, 11 Doan Van Bo, District 4, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
 
## Salary Expectation
* Competitive
 
## About Axon
 
![image](https://itviec.com/system/production/employers/logos/4066/axon-logo-170-151.png?1527066156)
 
Axon, an US product company, blends hardware, software, firmware, wearable technologies, artificial intelligence and innovation in one house. 
 
We strive to make the bullet obsolete and replace all police handguns with electronic devices. We also develop and manufacture in-car cameras and body-worn cameras that protect truth by capturing the scene, encrypting and watermarking the video while sending all the data up to the cloud in our SaaS platform that allows police, prosecutors, defense attorneys to view the evidence and see what happened when. 
 
Early in 2017, Axon acquired Misfit Computer Vision team and now we are expanding our investment and growing the office in all perspectives: Research & AI, Software development, Embedded & Firmware, Hardware.
 
Our team is solving some of the hardest cloud challenges today. Every day we manage petabytes of video from hundreds of thousands of police officers around the world, and help the public with creative solutions from the courtroom to public disclosure. Come work in an exciting environment in which you use your passion, experience, and strong analytical skills to help bring new technologies to public safety and leave a positive impact on the world.
 
## Requirements
 
* 5+ years of experience in frontend / full-stack software engineering
* Ability to write clean and concise code
* Deep understanding of frontend technologies
* Ability to work within an existing codebase
* Good sense of design
* Knowledge of CS fundamentals
* Ability to explain core frontend principles and technologies to other engineers
 
### Used Technology

* Javascript
* Lerna
* Webpack
* Babel
* React + Redux
* Flow
* Jest + Enzyme
* PostCSS
* Interfacing with Scala and Go backend services
 
### Responsibilities
 
As a senior software engineer on the Frontend Core team, you'll be responsible for building and maintaining the core frontend tools and framework used by every product team at Axon. Your day-to-day responsibilities will include defining reusable React components, defining our organization's standards and best practices, optimizing our build and test tools to maximize efficiency, and refactoring our products to improve overall quality and user experience. You will also have the opportunity to contribute to open source tools and libraries.
 
**Your Impact**
The ideal candidate for this role is someone who is good at executing on large projects, and isn't afraid to make big changes to fundamental aspects of our code. You should have a good sense of design and a strong drive to do right by our customers. As a senior engineer, you'll be expected to participate in design reviews and provide guidance for more junior team members in the form of PR reviews and general mentorship. You'll have the opportunity to make changes that benefit our customers and all other frontend engineers, so it's important to be able to explain what changes you're making and why, to make it easier for the other teams to understand.

 
### Why it would be awesome to work with us
 
*  An awesome office/working environment with the latest technologies and work with top engineers in the world
*  Competitive salary and benefits including a great medical insurance plan for you and your family
* Free lunch, gym, phone stipend, parking
* Fun team activities and outings
* Flexible working hours
* Opportunities for training in the US
* Opportunities to ride along with real US police officers in real life situations, see them use technology, and get inspired
 
### Contact
 
JD: https://bit.ly/2IzbBFV
Or contact: Dao Nguyen (daonguyen@axon.com)

- Experience building complex and impactful software in a team environment
- Proven ability to quickly learn new technologies and passion for quality, innovation, and world-class design
- Problem solving, creativity, and communication skills are essential working with remote co-workers

 
### Preferred Skills

- Experience designing and delivering high-availability, scalable cloud-based systems
- Familiarity in other languages like Java, Scala, Golang, React, Node.js
- Knowledge in creating and maintaining simple application installers, Windows services
- Experience in build and Continuous Integration tools/processes like MsBuild, TeamCity, FinalBuilder
- You have worn multiple technology hats, working on a variety of areas like back-end, front-end, client, mobile
- You have refactored aspects of a significant code base
- You enjoy mentoring and growing junior engineers

## Responsibilities

Axon, an US product company, blends hardware, software, firmware, wearable technologies, artificial intelligence and innovation in one house. 
 
We strive to make the bullet obsolete and replace all police handguns with electronic devices. We also develop and manufacture in-car cameras and body-worn cameras that protect truth by capturing the scene, encrypting and watermarking the video while sending all the data up to the cloud in our SaaS platform that allows police, prosecutors, defense attorneys to view the evidence and see what happened when.

fields.description:
## Location

## About CubiCasa

CubiCasa, a Finnish SaaS product company, market leader in Finnish real-estate marketing solutions sector and widening to global market especially US. We have been offered our service to more than 60 countries around the world with thousands of active users. We are focusing on 3D models, machine learning and AI with the passion to build the most scalable interior data understanding tech. 

The headquartered is in Oulu - a computer engineer's city. Cubicasa has offices in Helsinki, Palo Alto and Ho Chi Minh, and Hue. 

We just launched a new room scanning app and released it to App store recently. We decide to expand the develop team to strengthen our service and prepare for the challengeable future.  

## Requirements/skills (must have)
* 5+ years of experience in software engineering
* At least 2 years’ experience as a developer team lead
* Expertise: Python/Flask
* Strong experience in Vuejs and Javascript ES6 
* Familiarity with Rest APIs, AWS (Elastic Beanstalk), Postgres
* Good experience with some of these technologies such as JavaScript/jQuery, HTML5 and CSS3
* Good at english
* Good teamwork, communication, and interpersonal skills

### Responsibilities.
* Design, implement and maintain the applications for production team and clients based on existing versions: Strategic app planning, debug and define corrective actions, QA, user testing. 
* Investigate defect reports from production support and isolate their causes
* Design/architect complex web applications
* Manage a tech team
* Maintain and improve code quality by code reviews and best practices
* Communicate application requirements and design with other parties (production core development team (tech) and production) 

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* You will play the key role to develop the team in Vietnam. Being the very first brick for our empire in Vietnam and Asia, your work will certainly have significant impacts in our success in Asia market. 
* Flexibility comes with responsibility and trust: you could work remote sometimes when you need. Flexible working hours (within reason).
* Office exchange opportunities: (Palo Alto, California, Finland). Enjoy coding with snow and Santa Claus :) 
* 100% salary in probation period
* 15+ annual vacation paid days
* Laptop/computer will be provided

### Contact

* About our team: https://www.cubi.casa/about/

fields.title: Data Sharma - Senior Full Stack Javascript Developer - HCMC - FT.
fields.description:
## Location:
Ho Chi Minh city

## Salary Expectation
$3,000 - $4,000+
(Depend on experience, but start from $3,000 / month for qualified Senior Developers)

## Requirements & Skills
• 5-7 years experience, preferably within a large company
• Strong understanding of modern JavaScript, CSS and HTML concepts
• Strong understanding of Restful API design and Swagger
• Strong understanding of Service Oriented Architectures and microservices architectures
• Expert understanding and experience with the MEAN Stack, including 3+ years experience working
with Angular and 5+ year experience working with Node.js
• Expert understanding and experience with Mongo, MySQL, and PostgreSQL and a clear
understanding of the use cases for relational and non-relational data
• Demonstrable experience and/or familiarity with React and Vue
• Understanding of front-end development (HTML, CSS/SASS, etc) with an understanding of UX/UI
design principles
• Fluency in Git, GitHub and source code management concepts
• 5+ years working in a team environment using Scrum or another agile software development process
• Experience teaching and mentoring junior developers
• Experience working in distributed / remote work teams and work environments
• Strong english skills

### What you'll do 
• Collaborate with our team in every stage of a product’s lifecycle; from planning to delivery
• Create clean, modern, testable, well-documented code
• Work within an Agile team environment with modern JavaScript technologies to develop complex web
applications
• Confidently communicate daily to understand and deliver technical requirements
• Manage your own workflow to meet the deadlines set with the team.

### You're a great fit if you:
• Have a deep understanding of designing, writing, running, maintaining and debugging applications
across the whole JavaScript stack.
• Enjoy being part of a highly collaborative, remote-friendly environment.
• Have the ability to be self-directed and be effective working independently, yet feel equally comfortable
contributing in a team environment.
• Work well with technical and non-technical people to deliver high-value results.
• Are a problem solver with a business-driven approach.

  _We’re looking for someone who can comfortably work on applications / features / user stories independently. The ideal candidate has strong skills in both front-end development (CSS, HTML, React, Angular) and backend development (API design, NodeJs services, etc.) and can take a mock-up and create a working application. The ideal fit for our team is someone who has a love for coding and learning, works well in a remote / distributed team environment and is a high-energy strong communicator who can join an expert team and work with limited direction._**

### Get to Know Us:
Data Sharma is a mission-focused technology consulting company helping organizations operating on the forefront of humanity to optimize their impact. We are on a crusade to eradicate the world from outdated technologies and bring equality to technology access, tackling challenges in 20 countries and impacting over $100 million of initiatives and 100,000 people. The problems we solve everyday are real and require creativity, grit and determination. We are building a culture that challenges norms while fostering experimentation and personal growth. We are hiring team members who are passionate and energized by the vision of using technology to solve some of the world’s most important challenges. We would love for you to join us as we strive each day to find new ways of leveraging technology and data for good

### Contact
Please send all resumes to partners@datasharma.com with the subject line ‘Senior JavaScript
Developer’. No cover letter needed – honestly, we’d just love a really candid intro email where you
describe what you are hoping to do next and why you’d be interested in working with us. We will respond to every single email – so if you haven’t heard back we are probably busy reviewing!

![img_4875](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38338325/47542429-8722bf80-d907-11e8-8723-de2d8f689fdf.jpg)

## Location

* 139 Hong Ha, Phu Nhuan, Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $1,000 - $1,800 

## Projects
Check out the product at https://constant.money/
Deep dive in our source code on Github www.github.com/ninjadotorg

## The Job: Senior Frontend Engineer (Reactjs)
* Translation of designer mock-ups and wireframes into front-end code
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
* Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
* Work with QA to achieve 100% unit test and test automation. Work with QA to achieving high code coverage.
* Lead team and participate in cross-functional groups

## Requirements
* +3 year experience in Reactjs (knowing Javascript and its ecosystem, including ES6, babel, npm, yarn, and webpack is a plus)
* +5 year experience in frontend
* Experience in leading frontend team
* Site performance tuning & optimization
* Experience in convering from PSD, Sketch to sang HTML/CSS
* Experience in creating animation based on the design of designer (CSS3, Canvas, SGV,...)
* Detail - oriented, careful, good expertise in UI/UX is a plus

## Skills
* Reactjs
* ES6
* Javascript
* HTML, CSS

## Ideally

* Excellent verbal and written communication in English
* Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication, and organization
* Play soccer

### You can bring

* A passionate & dynamic mind
* A risktaker, a dreamer

### Team Culture Requirements

* Willingness to constantly learn new programming languages, tools, and technologies.
* You must be a fast and thorough learner, capable of systematically inquiring into new technologies and their foundations. Think and rethink, from the ground up.
* Able to constantly challenge yourself to stay on top of your game and upgrade yourself every day.

### Bonus Points (Not Required)
* Contribution to open-source projects.
* Excellent verbal and written communication in English.
* Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication, and organization.
* Play soccer.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* You be you.  We deeply care about helping everyone at Constant work on what they love, freely express their ideas within the organization, and grow to to their true potential.
* You be a better you.  Most of the time, you’ll be working on cutting edge technologies.  You’ll be constantly learning and improving your knowledge as an engineer, researcher or scientist.
* You are your own boss.  There is very little hierarchy at Constant.  Decision making processes are transparent and open to vote. We welcome all different ways of thinking and trust the people we work with to do what they do best. There is no micromanagement here.
* You the inventor.  Most of the time, you’ll find yourself working on a problem that doesn’t have a solution - yet. That’s where you come in.
* Solve problems for the world, not just Vietnam. Most of the problems we’re solving are for the global audience of today, and of tomorrow.
* Open source culture. We open source all of our projects on Github.

### The essentials
* Above-market salary and bonuses
* Total health care benefits for you and your family
* Standing desk, ergonomic chair
* Computers of your choice (Macbook Pro or Linux)
* Healthy lunch

fields.title: KapLan UK - Senior PHP/WP Developer - London - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* Borough High Street, London, United Kingdom 
* Postcode: SE1 1HR
* Full time

## Salary Expectation

* £ 55.000 – £ 60.000 /  year

## Requirements
* PHP
* PHP Framework: Yii or Laravel, etc...
* Angular
* **Experience worked abroad/onsite and studied abroad**

An excellent opportunity has arisen to join our Development team at Kaplan International (KI) as a hands-on Wordpress Development Lead.

You'll be based in our attractive, architect-designed offices in KI's corporate head office in London. We would also consider the possibility of a candidate being based from home up to 3 days per week, provided there is sufficient flexibility to attend meetings in our offices when required. As a developer, you'll working closely with colleagues in IT and marketing as well as having regular contact with our offshore development team in Vietnam.

## Responsibilities

As an experienced Development Lead, you will be working on number of exciting projects developed using **PHP/Yii** and **Angular** as well as working and managing our website built in **Wordpress CMS**. You will be responsible for both back-end and front-end development, including creating WordPress themes and plugins.

**Reporting to the Head of Development Manager, your responsibilities will include:**

- Establishing and guiding the website’s architecture
- Designing and implementing new features and functionality
- Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS
- Helping formulate an effective, responsive design and turning it into a working theme and plugin.
- Capable of understanding and contributing to the technical solution from design through to code level
- Working closely with Development Managers and Business Analysts to produce accurate delivery estimates and manage the transition from analysis through to design and delivery
- Define delivery phases of the project including activities, sub-activities, and milestones ensuring these are documented and used as the basis for the project event log, issues and risk log and any subsequent reporting
- Participate in reviews and meetings and provide updates on project progress.
- Take responsibility for ensuring that risks and issues are identified and managed closely and drive all stakeholders to deliver on time and to the required quality standards

## Person Specification

### Essential skills and experience

- Good understanding of the **front-end technologie**s like Angular, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery
- A strong understanding of the latest industry trends and content management systems.
- Considerable experience building user interfaces for websites and/or web applications.
- Some experience working as Development Lead, Technical Lead, Technical Manager, Technical Architect.
- Strong knowledge of **PHP** web frameworks like Yii, Laravel, etc.
- Understanding of MVC design patterns, fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
- Creating database schema that represent and support business processes
- Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases and their declarative query languages
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
- Knowledge of working with the RESTful APIs
- Thorough understanding of the responsibilities of the platform, database, API, caching layer, proxies, and other web services used in the system
- Ability to work using Agile methodologies.

### Desirable

- Experience of working on a microservice based architecture
- Working on a cloud based hosting platform like AWS
- Experience with project/bug management tools like Jira

# Personal qualities

- Excellent communication skills with the ability to clearly explain complex technical requirements to all levels of the business.
- Ability to think through problems and devise solutions that benefit the company in the long-term.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Self-starter and independent worker.
- Formal and methodical approach to development and writing code.
- This role suit someone working as or looking to move in to a role as Development Lead, Technical Lead, Technical Manager, Technical Architect. Solution Architect or Development Manager

## Salary and benefits
* Annual package: £ 55.000 – £ 60.000
* Work Permit package: £ 7.500
* One-way ticket to London, and Round Trip ticket yearly.
* Accommodation support and Shipping support.
* Annual Leave, Life Assurance, Private Medical form NHS
* Assistance with Childcare Costs, Volunteer Days, Eye Tests 
* Company Discounts, Taste Card, Gym Membership

### Contact
Homepage: https://kaplan.co.uk/
Email: hilly.funtom@gmail.com
Or Skype: hilly.chan

Please apply with CV and covering letter or Portfolio.

fields.description:
## Location

- District 7, Saigon, Vietnam

- Fulltime

Sendo.vn is the online marketplace of FPT Group which connects buyers and sellers around the country. Originally an e-commerce project of FPT Online JSC, Sendo.vn was officially launched on Sept 2012. On May 13rd 2014, Sendo Technology JSC was founded as a member of FPT Group and is responsible for operating Sendo.vn marketplace.

Up to now, more than 80,000 shops have been operating on Sendo.vn, offering a diverse range of products with over 5 million products from 21 different categories.

## Salary Expectation

* up to 45mil

## Requirements

- At least 2-year experience skilled at front-end/full-stack engineering using JavaScript, and 1-year of research or experience about ReactJS. Experience in back-end development is an advantage
- Ability to learn new technologies is important because technologies are continuously changing.
- Having experiences on creating your own products in ReactJS is a big plus.
- Understand 'Thinking in React' and how ReactJS works.
- Experience with state management: Flux/Redux. Knowledge of new Context APIs is a big plus.
- Good understanding of Webpack & Web Performance Optimization.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs.
- Fluency in HTML5 and CSS3. Familiar with CSS preprocessors: SASS/SCSS/LESS is a big plus.

### Responsibilities

- Develop new user-facing features using Javascript and React.js.
- Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
- Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
- Build web applications – Follow coding standards, write automated test cases, deployment scripts.
- Assist in improving app architectures – Explore existing systems, determines areas of maintainability scalability extensibility.
- Translate designs and style guides provided by the UI/UX team into high-performance functional user interfaces.
- Contribute to continual improvement by suggesting new and emerging front-end technologies.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us

fields.title: CodeLink - Rails / NodeJS / ReactJS - HCMC - FT
fields.description:
![codelink-headline_photo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/122055/45735250-692fb400-bc11-11e8-8188-f00d0640b47a.jpg)

## Location

We are conveniently located on Truong Dinh at the border of District 1 and District 3, with easy access for all districts and a plentiful amount of awesome food and great coffee shops around the office

## Salary Expectation
* $800+ for junior developer
* $1200+ for mid-level developer
* $2000+ for senior developer

## About us

CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development studio made up of an international mix of Designers and Developers. We work with start-ups to launch their products and win the market. Our main stacks are Rails, Python, NodeJS, ReactJS and ReactNative. We have built products in different industries, including Finance, Education, Entertainment, HR etc. 

We are building an engineer-first environment. We want all members to grow with the company through hands-on projects and industry best practices. Our clients have an extremely high expectation and that sets a bar for our quality of work. 

We choose **Rails** because it is quick to convert ideas to realities thanks to its mature ecosystem and abstraction. Rails has RSpec as a sidekick to ensure software quality and maintainability of ever-changing business requirements. 

We choose **React and React Native** because of the "learn once, write anywhere" approach. Our engineers can comfortably develop apps for web, iOS and Android using the same skills and mindsets. 

We choose **NodeJS / ExpressJS** because of its flexibility and the common use of Javascript. 

We are willing to adopt new and proven technologies, provided that they bring business values to our clients and learning opportunities for our engineers. We have our freedom to choose and recommend what solutions are best for a certain project. Redux, Observables, ImmutableJS, Typescript, Jest, GraphQL , Apollo, Docker... are applied across our teams.  

## Requirements

+ Require a minimum of 1 year of experience (mobile, web). 
+ Require solid Front-End knowledge in Javascript and/or HTML/CSS. 
+ Require relevant knowledge of relational database systems like PostgreSQL and MySQL. 
+ Familiar with web technologies like REST API, security, performance etc. 
+ Familiar with deployment, scaling, monitoring and performance tuning. 
+ Require Git, Github and Pull Request knowledge. 
+ Familiar with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies. 
+ Familiar with Extreme Programming methodologies of TDD (Test Driven Development), Refactoring and Continuous Integration. 
+ Strong written and verbal communication skills in English. 

## Responsibilities

+ Work on rapidly creating new Web and Mobile products for a diverse range of Clients and industries. 
+ Work and pair with other developers to build applications with the stack mentioned above. 
+ Actively involved in product discussions and Sprint Planning. 
+ Work with Product Owner to convert business requirements into technical designs. 
+ Cooperate with UI Designer to implement modern minimalist designs into production. 
+ Learn new languages and frameworks to improve yourself and stay current in an ever-changing environment. 
+ Contribute to the local Tech Ecosystem by mentoring, writing articles and joining events.

## How we work

We work with a true team mindset, with every member having equal say in how we run our projects, our technologies and our product decisions. We work as a tight and unified team, investing in the development of all members of our team and the furthering of their abilities. 

We focus on creating qualified software and on improving our engineers. You are required to write neat code and follow highly efficient workflow, but you are about to learn tons of new things along the way via pair programming, code review and mentorship. 

## Why you’ll love working with us

- Absolutely no overtime. We respect work-life balance. 
- We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new programming language, product understanding and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team. 
- We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand and believe in what they are developing. 
- We are very selective with our Clients, we only work on awesome Products we believe in and that show strong market potential. 
- We respect you and your personal hours, we keep sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve. 
- We work fully Agile, and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity. 

## Contact

Khac Anh: ka_at_codelink_dot_io

fields.title: Grab - Software Engineer, Fullstack - HCMC - Fulltime
fields.description:
## Location

* MapleTree, 1060 Nguyen Van Linh Str., District 7, Saigon
* Fulltime
* Grab is more than just the leading ride-hailing and mobile payments app in Southeast Asia. We use data and technology to improve everything from transportation to payments and logistics across a region of more than 620 million people. Working with governments, drivers, passengers, and charities, we aim to unlock the true potential of the region by solving problems that hinder progress.
Grab began as a taxi-hailing app in 2012, but has extended its product platform to include private car services (GrabCar & GrabShare), motorcycle taxis (GrabBike), social carpooling (GrabHitch) and last mile delivery (GrabExpress). We are focused on pioneering new commuting alternatives for drivers and passengers with an emphasis on speed, safety, and reliability. Currently we offer services in Singapore, Indonesia, Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam; however, we also have R&D offices in Bangalore, Beijing, & Seattle

## Requirements
### The must haves
* Experience in shipping web applications to production, CI/CD flow
* Familiarity with the whole web stack, web protocols, and web performance optimization techniques
* In-depth understanding of web frameworks (we use Rails)
* Detailed knowledge of minimum one modern JavaScript framework: React, Ember, Angular, etc
* Proficient understanding of the HTTP protocol

### Nice-to-haves
* Experience with ES6/ES2015 or ES7/ES2016
* Experience with React, Redux/Typescript
* Experience with at least one CSS preprocessor: Sass, Less, PostCSS, Stylus, etc

## Responsibilities
* Design, implement & manage web apps that impact millions of users
* Experience a shipping culture that uses the state of the art web technologies
* Grow in an environment passionate about knowledge-sharing and code review
* Learn software engineering practices for coding at scale: static analysis, feature flags, instrumentation, and more

### The day-to-day activities
* Design and implement RESTful APIs
* Build and deploy performant modern web applications in React, Redux, Webpack, ES6, Flow and Typescript
* Architect efficient and scalable backend systems
* Write unit, functional and end-to-end tests
* Write high-quality code (Ruby on Rails, Go) that communicates with upstream backend services via HTTP APIs, gRPC, graphql
* Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues
* Participate in code reviews

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* Positive & Collaborative environment
Grabbers thrive in a corporate culture that values every team member's contribution towards our goal of improving lives.

* Rocket fuel for careers
Grabbers experience hyper professional growth and all the challenges that entails. Grow your skills while working to solve real issues across the region.

* Fun & dedicated family
Grabbers work hard and play hard. Our teams grow as one as they overcome challenges and have fun along the way.

* Some of benefits are:
Macbook is provided.
Extra Medical Insurance.
14 days annual leaves, working Monday - Friday.
Fresh fruit, snack and coffee everyday.
Free drive with Grab (budget follow your level)
### Interesting engineering projects

About Autonomous
Constant is a different kind of cryptocurrency. Like Bitcoin, it is completely decentralized; nobody owns or controls Constant. Unlike Bitcoin however, Constant is stable, so you can spend it on everyday things.

People continue to choose paper money for the benefits of privacy, control and autonomy, but it nervously sits under mattresses, and can only travel through multiple hands. fields.title: Constant (US blockchain fintech startup) - 2 Frontend Engineer Reactjs - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* 139 Hong Ha, Phu Nhuan, Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $1300 - $1,800
* Fulltime

## About Constant
Constant builds blockchain powered financial tools for a connected world. We help people grow, move and access money - no matter who they are, where they live, or how much they have. We are first and foremost a technology company dedicated to finding new and better ways to build useful products for real people.

Check out the project at [constant.money.](https://www.myconstant.com/)

## The Job: Frontend Reactjs Engineer 
We need the best Senior Front End Engineer to lead the Autonomous frontend team.

* Translation of designer mock-ups and wireframes into front-end code
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
* Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
* Work with QA to achieve 100% unit test and test automation. Work with QA to achieving high code coverage.
* Collaborate with other team members and participate in cross-functional groups

## Requirements
* +2 year experience in Reactjs (knowing Javascript and its ecosystem, including ES6, babel, npm, yarn, and webpack is a plus)
* +5 year experience in frontend
* Site performance tuning & optimization
* Experience in convering from PSD, Sketch to HTML/CSS
* Detail - oriented, careful, good expertise in UI/UX is a plus
* Experience in leading frontend team is a plus

## Ideally

* Excellent verbal and written communication in English
* Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication, and organization
* Play soccer

### You can bring

* A passionate & dynamic mind
* A risk taker, a dreamer
* A willing-to-learn person

### Team Culture Requirements

* Willingness to constantly learn new programming languages, tools, and technologies.
* You must be a fast and thorough learner, capable of systematically inquiring into new technologies and their foundations. Think and rethink, from the ground up.
* Able to constantly challenge yourself to stay on top of your game and upgrade yourself every day.

### Bonus Points (Not Required)
* Contribution to open-source projects.
* Excellent verbal and written communication in English.
* Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication, and organization.
* Play soccer.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* You be you.  We deeply care about helping everyone at Constant work on what they love, freely express their ideas within the organization, and grow to to their true potential.
* You be a better you.  Most of the time, you’ll be working on cutting edge technologies.  You’ll be constantly learning and improving your knowledge as an engineer, researcher or scientist.
* You are your own boss.  There is very little hierarchy at Constant.  Decision making processes are transparent and open to vote. We welcome all different ways of thinking and trust the people we work with to do what they do best. There is no micromanagement here.
* You the inventor.  Most of the time, you’ll find yourself working on a problem that doesn’t have a solution - yet. That’s where you come in.
* Solve problems for the world, not just Vietnam. Most of the problems we’re solving are for the global audience of today, and of tomorrow.
* Open source culture. We open source all of our projects on Github.

### The essentials
* Above-market salary and bonuses
* Total health care benefits for you and your family
* Standing desk, ergonomic chair
* Computers of your choice (Macbook Pro or Linux)
* Healthy lunch
* Private American English teacher 3 times a week
* Gym, yoga, zumba, karate classes throughout the week.  We play soccer every Friday!
* Company retreat & quarterly team retreat
* Travel internationally to conferences and tradeshows as needed

### Contact
Email: hoa@autonomous.nyc
Phone: 02862690290
Career page: 
www.autonomous.ai/talents/senior-frontend-engineer-for-constant
www.facebook.com/Autonomouscareers

fields.title: TurndotMedia - Jr Python Fullstack Developer - Remote - FT/PT
fields.description:
## Location

* Remote

_For the first 8-12 months the job will be completely remote; however, we're looking to add offices within Saigon within the next 8-12 months. That being stated, if you don't live in SGN we're not requesting you to relocate.  We'll love for you come in once in a while._ 

## Salary Expectation

* 750+ PT
* 1,500+ FT

## Requirements

* 4+ years of experience in web development with strong knowledge of Linux ecosystem (ubuntu), development process.
* Comfortable with web technologies (HTML, CSS and Javascript) 
* 2+ years of experience with Python language including apps like Django and Flask
 * 1+ years experience with PostgresSQL with a strong ability on creating queries and minimizing lookup times.  
* Experience with Nginx (We're using Openresty)
* Experience with web scrapping (no framework required)
* Willingness to learn or experience with Python Async 
* Quiet place to work


## Skills

### Must Have

* **Proficient English communication skills and writing**
* Be openminded and willing to learn about new technologies 
* Question everything, but understand the goals
* Move fast and break things (Sorry for the Facebook motto).... but its true.. We care more about pushing, testing, and then redefining (we're not working on clients stuff, so we're more understanding to bugs.)... Sometimes things just work, even if they are ugly! 
* Foresee issues that might happen within the production environment and make a risk assessment to define within our priorities.
* Willingness to understand what needs to be done vs what is nice to have... (busy work is a no no)
* Focus on built-in Python features that make sense instead of always adding complexity
* Talk to non-developers to help build out ideas
* Eye for automation 


### Ideally

* Experience with following libs (Github if you don't know)
```
- Sanic
- Redis
- html5-parser
- jinja 
- Flask
```
* Consist hashing 
* Mirco services 
* Randomization algos 

## Job Description / Introduction

We're currently moving forward on building out what was once a side project into a full flagship project. 

As it stands we have a collection of applications that have a strong codebase that need further development and retooling. 

New developer task is to dig deep into the code base, focus on current priorities, and further the application for improvements. 

In a sense take over as lead developer of the project. 


### Responsibilities

- Develop, optimize, maintain, scale existing apps
- Develop redundancy to limit the amount of downtime
- Create well-documented code


### You can bring

* FUCK YES attitude


### Why it would be awesome to work with us

* Working on solutions that most people WILL NOT encounter in their career ie an app that deals with 12-30 million web request per DAY.. YES PER DAY!

* We want someone that is interested in being at the ground floor of things, become a key player in the company. 

* We're completely honest about our limitations as a company, and what things we're looking to improve upon. 

* Introduction into the affiliate marketing space 

* No office political or nonsense like that... We want to stay small in terms of man power, but use tech for what it should be used for... To scale things. 

* We're not seflish, if we grow, we want to bring you with us. 
* We respect your time, family, and life.
* If you're the same person in 6 months.... we'll feel bad for you.
* No BS!
* Sorry we don't have sneaks, but we're growing and we respect the fact you might not like sneaks lol. 
* We believe in team grow above all 
* CODE SOMETHING DEPLOY LIVE! Yep... deploy live always... We do this for a reason 
* 13 Months Salary + Increase salary over time based on performance 


### Contact
Email me charles@turndotmedia.com

fields.title: CodeLink - Java web developer - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
![jd_photo_slideshow](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/122055/57909658-90787700-78ad-11e9-9630-e38138d697b5.jpeg)

## Location

We are conveniently located on Truong Dinh at the border of District 1 and District 3, with easy access for all districts and a plentiful amount of awesome food and great coffee shops around the office

## Salary Expectation
* $1000+

## About us

CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development studio made up of an international mix of Designers and Developers. We work with start-ups to launch their products and win the market. Our main stacks are Java, Rails, Python, NodeJS, ReactJS and ReactNative. We have built products in different industries, including Finance, Education, Entertainment, HR etc. 

We are building an engineer-first environment. We want all members to grow with the company through hands-on projects and industry best practices. Our clients have an extremely high expectation and that sets a bar for our quality of work. 

We are willing to adopt new and proven technologies, provided that they bring business values to our clients and learning opportunities for our engineers. We have our freedom to choose and recommend what solutions are best for a certain project. Akka, Spring, GraalVM, Kafka, Docker, Kubernetes... are applied across our teams. 

## The Job

We are building a digital asset system for one of the biggest game company in the world. The core backend needs to integrate different services to provide a smooth flow of collaboration between teams. You will be working directly with a team of technical and product people in Canada to build this platform for hundreds of internal staff members. 
We are looking for someone with a solid Java background to lead the project. 

## Requirements

+ Require a minimum of 2 years of experience with Java and at least 1 web framework: Spring, Play / Akka, Struts, JSF, Hibernates, GWT
+ Require relevant knowledge of relational database systems like PostgreSQL and MySQL
+ Require relevant knowledge of deployment with Docker
+ Require Git, Github and Pull Request knowledge
+ Require relevant experience with web technologies like REST API, security, performance etc.
+ Require hands-on experience with JUnit
+ Familiar with deployment, scaling, monitoring and performance tuning
+ Familiar with NoSQL
+ Familiar with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies
+ Familiar with Extreme Programming methodologies of TDD (Test Driven Development), Refactoring and Continuous Integration

## Responsibilities

+ Work on rapidly creating new Web and Mobile products for a diverse range of Clients and industries. 
+ Work and pair with other developers to build applications with the stack mentioned above. 
+ Actively involved in product discussions and Sprint Planning. 
+ Work with Product Owner to convert business requirements into technical designs. 
+ Cooperate with UI Designer to implement modern minimalist designs into production. 
+ Learn new languages and frameworks to improve yourself and stay current in an ever-changing environment. 
+ Contribute to the local Tech Ecosystem by mentoring, writing articles and joining events.

## How we work

We work with a true team mindset, with every member having equal say in how we run our projects, our technologies and our product decisions. We work as a tight and unified team, investing in the development of all members of our team and the furthering of their abilities. 

We focus on creating qualified software and on improving our engineers. You are required to write neat code and follow highly efficient workflow, but you are about to learn tons of new things along the way via pair programming, code review and mentorship. 

## Why you’ll love working with us

- Absolutely no overtime. We respect work-life balance. 
- We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new programming language, product understanding and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team. 
- We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand and believe in what they are developing. 
- We are very selective with our Clients, we only work on awesome Products we believe in and that show strong market potential. 
- We respect you and your personal hours, we keep sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve. 
- We work fully Agile, and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity. 

## Contact

Khac Anh: ka_at_codelink_dot_io

fields.title: TIKI - SDE (Software Development Engineer) - HCM/HN - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* HCM: Floor 3 - Viettel Building - 285 CMT8, Ward 12, District 10.
* HN: VIT Building, Kim Ma, Ba Dinh.

## Salary Expectation: Up to 2k

* We are Tiki.vn - the most trusted E-Commerce platform in Vietnam. We serve millions of customers and post 3-digit growth every year. On a typical day, our system handles over 200 million database transactions, enabling thousands of sellers and staffs to operate on the platform. Every piece in Tiki’s system has to be reliable, stable and scalable.

* Tiki Marketplace platform allows sellers to promote and sell their products to millions of customers. Product quality always comes first at Tiki, thus it is our mission to empower sellers with such products to grow their online businesses.

## Marketplace system has great responsibilities at:

1. How to manage a thousand sellers efficiently? It allows sellers to register, manage their accounts, permissions based on their role.

2. How to manage a million products with complicated attribute structure and many kind fulfilment processes?

3. How to operate a sophisticated order business flow?

4. How to report revenue of thousand sellers with flexible commission/fee model?

5. How to provide high-performance API to other systems that can handle at least 1k requests per second and 4 million data changes per day

6. How to integrate in real time to various kinds of system:

* Warehouse system to manage inventory adapt to multiple warehouse location
* Accounting system to report revenue
* Order system to manage order flow
* Caching/Indexing system to update high-performance data source such as Redis, Elastic, Mongo Database…

## _We_ are looking for talented software engineers who’d love to tackle challenges in a complex E-commerce system. You will be building and optimizing critical components of the platform:

* Catalogue management system: scale up management of millions of physical and virtual products. Technology: PHP, MySQL, Kafka

* Indexing system: ensure smooth propagation of changes between databases and provide fast data access to be able to handle thousands of messages per second. Technology: Java, Kafka Stream, Mongo, Elastic...

* High-performance product catalogue API: scale up the highest throughput API in Tiki’s system. These APIs have to handle at least ten thousand requests per seconds. Technology: Node.JS, Mongo, Redis

* Seller management system: help internal staff manage sellers registrations and set up advanced commission/fee model. Technology: PHP, MySQL

* Order management system: help sellers process their orders as fast as possible. Technology: PHP, MySQL

## Responsibilities:
## Inside our engineering team:

* We iterate constantly. There's no such thing as the best version of anything, just a constant streams of improvements and tests.
* We move fast, really fast. Major changes can be executed in a few days, many times just a few hours.
* We have a data-informed mindset. We try to use data to inform our decision as much as possible.
* We are independent. Most of the time, your team will not need technical assistance from other teams.
* We take risks. We're not afraid to challenge "best practices".
## Our attractive offers include:
* Open communication with passionate and experienced members.
* Challenging working environment.
* Easy access to the library with tons of startup, product, UX, coding... books.
* Private healthcare insurance.
* Annual health check-ups.
* Special internal programs for Tikiers when shopping on Tiki.vn (free ship TikiNow service, discount...).
* Internal events to bond our mutual understanding & spirit such as team building, team outing, * Tiki's birthday, year-end party...
* New & beautiful office with a pantry room (with bar), entertainment & gymnastic equipment, yoga rooms, a library and an open space facilitating cross-department communication.
Competitive salary and performance review (twice a year), 13th-month pay based on performance.

## Skills
* Bachelor of computer science
* Good at problem-solving
* Good at least one of programming languages: PHP, Java, Python, Node.Js, Go, C/C++ ...
* Good at OOP
## For senior require more:
* 5+ years of Software Engineering, with a proven track record of delivering large-scale, distributed, web-based production systems.
* Understanding of design for large scalability, performance and reliability.
* Experience working on a large scale deployment and performance tuning.
* Strong at object-oriented analysis and design.

### Contact
HP: 0916 555 337
Skype: hoaitan.hr@outlook.com
mail: tan.trinh@tiki.vn
