fields.title: dataPlor - Full Stack Rails Developer - Remote - FT
fields.description:
![dataPlor](https://assets.dataplor.com/random/header.png)

## Location

* You - Remote, probably in Vietnam
* Us - Based in the US

## Salary Expectation

* $1500USD - $3000USD / month

## Skills
* Great Ruby skills
* Know Rails inside and out
* Know your way around SQL

## Requirements
* You would be the third member of our engineering team, so you will be working closely with our CTO and mobile engineer. As a key member of a small team, **great communication skills** (and fluency in English) is essential.
* Our API is written in Ruby using Rails and **strong experience with RoR** is required.
* We believe in testing, and use Rspec to unit and integration test our API. You should be **familiar with testing techniques** and have a sense of when testing is appropriate and when it’s not.
* We store data in a SQL database, and use SQL liberally throughout the app to improve performance. We also use SQL to generate data reports that Operations and Sales rely on, so you should be **proficient in SQL**.

### Ideally

* We maintain multiple client apps that consume our API that are written in Javascript using React. The ideal candidate would be **proficient in Javascript** as well, but at a minimum you should have some experience with Javascript and be willing to work towards productivity in React.
* We have a mobile Android engineer, but if you can **contribute in Kotlin** as well, that’s a huge bonus.
* We are heading towards products that incorporate **Natural Language Processing**, so experience with that would also be a huge bonus.

### Responsibilities

* Maintain and build APIs for our multiple client apps
* Analyze and improve performance of the API
* Develop multi-modal communication flows over email, SMS, in-App notifications
* Build awesome internal tools to support sales and operations
* Contribute to the web and android client apps

### Why it would be awesome to work with us

* We are a young company who work remotely but move fast to hit our goals. 
* You'll be given as much responsibility as you can handle, and the sky's the limit.
* We're trying to build a world class group of people who are solid, well-rounded engineers for our tech team.
* We promote learning and growing the skillset of every member on the team.
* We have daily standups, and get together a couple of times a year to interact with each other face to face, eat, drink, and have fun together.

### Our tech team so far
[![Ryan](https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGgtsv-jBjHag/profile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200/0?e=1564012800&v=beta&t=NYaY9Tv6tHNrdCCKLZV4j8n9Tb5CHq9vJSy6go03mW0)](https://github.com/rurabe)
[![Edgar](https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQEWon6VJaUmTA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1564012800&v=beta&t=yWrcB3-n-mbWZhfQojHD31rbng-7L46RujBVC2uFsaY)](https://github.com/edgarplor)

### Contact
Homepage: https://www.dataplor.com
Email: adam@dataplor.com

fields.description:

* Singapore

## Who are you?
Are you an experienced Ruby on Rails developer/leader with interests in DevOps practices and Cloud computing using AWS? We are looking for you! This is an amazing chance to work with a fast-growing American start-up based in HCM and Singapore! Take a step up in your career today and get in touch with us.
Below more information about the scope of work: 

## Requirements
•	Design, develop and maintain our core operational systems utilizing clean, maintainable code.
•	Help to plan, oversee and implement new features within our product and systems.
•	Partner with product managers, designers and QA engineers to bring life to new features and products.
•	Utilize monitoring and logging to improve the quality and speed of our codebase.
•	Evangelize best practices within the engineering groups.
•	Help to develop our internal processes and tools as we move towards a fully automated Cl/CD process.
•	Perform and participate in code reviews and "lunch and learns" to foster training and
•	development across the team.
•	Provide mentorship and support to junior team members.

## Skills
•	5+ years of professional Ruby on Rails experience with a proven track record of successful projects.
•	Expert using ROR & JavaScript.
•	Strong understanding of object-oriented programming best practices and design patterns.
•	Strong familiarity with data stores - we use MySQL, Redis, Memcached and Elasticsearch.
•	Significant experience building, scaling and supporting web applications both internal and consumer-facing.
•	Comfortable being productive independently while staying integrated with the larger engineering team.
•	Experience working with G it and Git Hub (specifically working with pull requests).
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

### Ideally
o	Experience working with an agile team.
o	Familiarity with React, Redux or GraphQL is a big positive.
o	Knowledge working with data pipelines (we use Amazon Kinesis) and data & Bl platforms (we utilize TreasureData, Amazon Red Shift, Amazon Lambda and Cha rt.io).
o	Experience with service-oriented architectures.
o	Familiarity with AWS or Google Cloud Platform.
o	Experience doing DevOps work is a big plus (we prefer Ansible, Terraform and AWS but appreciate all experience!)


### Why it would be awesome to work with us

We are building a local talent network for global needs! 
We connect elite developers with Singaporean startups so they can grow their careers faster.


### Contact
For more information about the company, the role and the attractive salary – get in touch with Clement Chretien or Meraj Qazi asap. We will get back to you with information and feedback!

clement.chretien@expanda.io

fields.title: MY CONSTANT (US blockchain startup) - 1 Frontend Engineer Reactjs - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* 139 Hong Ha, Phu Nhuan, Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $1300 - $1,800
* Fulltime

## Projects: My Constant
Constant builds blockchain powered financial tools for a connected world. We help people grow, move and access money - no matter who they are, where they live, or how much they have. We are first and foremost a technology company dedicated to finding new and better ways to build useful products for real people.

Come join our extraordinary team of more than 50 scientists, engineers, designers, writers, economists, and customer experience specialists from all over the world. Help us take money global.

Check out the project at [constant.money.](https://www.myconstant.com/)
Deep dive in our source code on [Github](https://github.com/ninjadotorg/constant-explorer)
Connect us on [Medium](https://medium.com/@constantp2p)

## The Job: Frontend Reactjs Engineer 
We need the best Senior Front End Engineer to lead the Autonomous frontend team.

* Translation of designer mock-ups and wireframes into front-end code
* Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
* Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
* Work with QA to achieve 100% unit test and test automation. Work with QA to achieving high code coverage.
* Collaborate with other team members and participate in cross-functional groups

## Requirements
* +2 year experience in Reactjs (knowing Javascript and its ecosystem, including ES6, babel, npm, yarn, and webpack is a plus)
* +5 year experience in frontend
* Site performance tuning & optimization
* Experience in convering from PSD, Sketch to HTML/CSS
* Detail - oriented, careful, good expertise in UI/UX is a plus
* Experience in leading frontend team is a plus

## Ideally

* Excellent verbal and written communication in English
* Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication, and organization
* Play soccer

### You can bring

* A passionate & dynamic mind
* A risk taker, a dreamer
* A willing-to-learn person

### Team Culture Requirements

* Willingness to constantly learn new programming languages, tools, and technologies.
* You must be a fast and thorough learner, capable of systematically inquiring into new technologies and their foundations. Think and rethink, from the ground up.
* Able to constantly challenge yourself to stay on top of your game and upgrade yourself every day.

### Bonus Points (Not Required)
* Contribution to open-source projects.
* Excellent verbal and written communication in English.
* Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication, and organization.
* Play soccer.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* You be you.  We deeply care about helping everyone at My Constant work on what they love, freely express their ideas within the organization, and grow to to their true potential.
* You be a better you.  Most of the time, you’ll be working on cutting edge technologies.  You’ll be constantly learning and improving your knowledge as an engineer, researcher or scientist.
* You are your own boss.  There is very little hierarchy at My Constant.  Decision making processes are transparent and open to vote. We welcome all different ways of thinking and trust the people we work with to do what they do best. There is no micromanagement here.
* You the inventor.  Most of the time, you’ll find yourself working on a problem that doesn’t have a solution - yet. That’s where you come in.
* Solve problems for the world, not just Vietnam. Most of the problems we’re solving are for the global audience of today, and of tomorrow.
* Open source culture. We open source all of our projects on Github.

### The essentials
* Above-market salary and bonuses
* Total health care benefits for you and your family
* Standing desk, ergonomic chair
* Computers of your choice (Macbook Pro or Linux)
* Healthy lunch
* Private American English teacher 3 times a week
* Gym, yoga, zumba, karate classes throughout the week.  We play soccer every Friday!
* Company retreat & quarterly team retreat
* Travel internationally to conferences and tradeshows as needed

### Contact
Email: hoa@autonomous.nyc
Phone: 02862690290
Career page: 
www.autonomous.ai/talents/senior-frontend-engineer-for-constant
www.facebook.com/Autonomouscareers

fields.title: CodeLink - Rails - HCMC - FT
fields.description:
![jd_photo_slideshow](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/122055/57909658-90787700-78ad-11e9-9630-e38138d697b5.jpeg)

## Location

We are conveniently located on Truong Dinh at the border of District 1 and District 3, with easy access for all districts and a plentiful amount of awesome food and great coffee shops around the office

## Salary Expectation
* $800+ for junior developer
* $1200+ for mid-level developer
* $2000+ for senior developer

## About us

CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development studio made up of an international mix of Designers and Developers. Our main stacks are Rails, NodeJS, VueJS and ReactJS. We have built products in different industries, including Finance, Education, Entertainment, HR, etc for clients ranging from start-ups such as CryptoKitties to big companies such as Air Asia and Electronic Arts.

We are building an engineer-first environment. We want all members to grow with the company through hands-on projects and industry best practices. Our clients have extremely high expectations and that sets a bar for our quality of work.

Our engineers work directly with international teams from Canada, US (Silicon Valley, Boston), Germany and other well-developed tech scenes. We have learned a lot from them, and vice versa. 

We are willing to adopt new but proven technologies provided that they bring business values to our clients and learning opportunities for our engineers. We have our freedom to choose and recommend what solutions are best for a certain project.

We are looking for an experienced Rails developer to lead the back-end of an HR platform. The work is challenging: design the architecture of a big system that integrates with other platforms, implement new features, refactor existing codebase etc. You will have a chance to develop your Rails and back-end skills quickly. 

## Requirements

+ Require a minimum of 2 years of experience with Rails framework. 
+ Require relevant knowledge of relational database systems like PostgreSQL and MySQL. 
+ Required experience with Kafka & Zookeeper
+ Familiar with web technologies like REST API, security, performance etc. 
+ Familiar with deployment, scaling, monitoring and performance tuning. 
+ Require Git, Github and Pull Request knowledge. 
+ Familiar with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies. 
+ Familiar with Extreme Programming methodologies of TDD (Test Driven Development), Refactoring and Continuous Integration. 
+ Strong written and verbal communication skills in English. 

## Responsibilities

+ Work on rapidly creating new Web and Mobile products for a diverse range of Clients and industries. 
+ Work and pair with other developers to build applications with the stack mentioned above. 
+ Actively involved in product discussions and Sprint Planning. 
+ Work with Product Owner to convert business requirements into technical designs. 
+ Cooperate with UI Designer to implement modern minimalist designs into production. 
+ Learn new languages and frameworks to improve yourself and stay current in an ever-changing environment. 
+ Contribute to the local Tech Ecosystem by mentoring, writing articles and joining events.

## How we work

We work with a true team mindset, with every member having equal say in how we run our projects, our technologies and our product decisions. We work as a tight and unified team, investing in the development of all members of our team and the furthering of their abilities. 

We focus on creating qualified software and on improving our engineers. You are required to write neat code and follow highly efficient workflow, but you are about to learn tons of new things along the way via pair programming, code review and mentorship. 

## Why you’ll love working with us

- Absolutely no overtime. We respect work-life balance. 
- We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new programming language, product understanding and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team. 
- We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand and believe in what they are developing. 
- We are very selective with our Clients, we only work on awesome Products we believe in and that show strong market potential. 
- We respect you and your personal hours, we keep sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve. 
- We work fully Agile, and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity. 

## Contact

Khac Anh: ka_at_codelink_dot_io

fields.title: Freelensia - CTO/Rails Developer - Remote/Saigon - FT/PT
fields.description:
![rails hiring poster](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27481639/46718039-299a3c00-cc94-11e8-85f7-446f7c0b8311.png)

## About us
* [Freelensia](https://www.freelensia.com) is the world's first online interpreter reservation platform. Based in Vietnam, the website launched in March 2017 and now have more than 3000 interpreters from around the world. On Freelensia, interpreters post listings advertising their language skills, while companies browse and make a reservation online. We aspire to become the AirBNB for interpreters and are looking for a tech lead / CTO to realize our vision, or full-stack Rails developers to execute that vision.

## Location
* D7, Saigon, Vietnam (FT), or
* Remote (PT)

## Compensation
* $1000-1800/month with up to 10% equity for co-founders / CTO positions
* $10-$20/hour for PT

## Technical Requirements
* Full-stack mid to senior developer with at least 3 years of experience at top-tier startups or outsourcing companies
* Experience with: 
    * Rails 5.1.1 
    * React + jQuery
    * MySQL 5.7
    * Node.js 7.8
    * Testing frameworks (RSpec, Cucumber)
* Familiarity with AWS, S3, ability to set up and perform deployments preferred
* Familiarity of Clojure a big bonus

## Other requirements
* Can translate a business requirement into multiple technical solutions and explain the pros and cons of each
* Familiar with task management and chat program (Asana, Trello, Slack, etc.)
* Can break a task into sub-tasks, estimate required hours and completion date
* Disciplined and hard-working, do what it takes to complete a task on-time
* English is not required (you can practice your English as most of us are fluent, but not necessary)
* For FT: candidates living near D7 preferred

### Responsibilities
* Build and refine new features for our platform such as our interactive landing page, user profiles, search engine, reservation calendar, blog, payment, etc.
* Fix bugs, write tests
* Help recruit and train junior / freelancers

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* The very first FT tech position in a global-aiming startup
* Office in D7 with all of the greenies and fresh air
* A laid-back and simple culture: be bold, work hard, earn what you deserve and enjoy the show!
* You are encouraged to contribute your ideas to our vision, technical road map and implementation processes

### Contact
Homepage: freelensia.com
**How to apply: link.freelensia.com/careers-tech**

fields.title: Christina's - Senior Software Engineer (Python) - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
## Location
* Saigon, Vietnam
* District 1 

## About the company
Team Christina’s consists of world travellers, Vietnamese returnees, and local graduates, citizens, and entrepreneurs from all different backgrounds. We believe that in order to best understand and anticipate the needs of our guests, our team needs to reflect the diversity of our guests as much as possible.

## About our products
At Christina’s, we call ourselves a tech-enabled travel company. Having a technology team since the beginning is one of the most crucial conditions that enable us to scale up the company at a rapid rate, while still maintaining our amazing guest experience. In just 4 years, we have grown from 2.5 people in Saigon into a team of more than 400 people in 6 cities and we are still growing fast to other cities and countries. Together with that growth, technology is getting a more and more important role in the company.

Christina’s Tech team is working alongside with our operation teams to create software products that facilitate the team’s operation and enhance the experience of travelers. Our products range from operating software, booking websites, to communication apps, travel planning tools, and a lot more.

We are looking for more software engineers to join us on our road to become the #1 fully integrated travel experience company in the world.

Check-out our hosts technology at https://www.christinas.vn/host-tech/

## What will you do
* To create software products that enhance the experience of travellers and facilitate the team's operations.
* To be involved in every phase of the development process: ideation, development, launch, and maintenance.
* To be able to work closely with other teams.
* To keep the software products high-quality and maintainable.

## What will you need
* 3+ years of software development experience.
* Demonstrable ability to work on at least one of these types of software products: web apps, mobile apps, or desktop apps.
* Ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies. We do not have requirements on previous experience with any specific technology because technologies are continuously changing. Therefore, we believe the ability to learn is more important. (By the way, we are using Django, PostgreSQL, React and React Native).
* Ability to communicate, present ideas, and handle feedbacks constructively.
* Willing to help your teammates, share your knowledge with them, and learn from them.
* Ability to work independently with little or no supervision.
* Experiences on creating your own products are a big plus.

## What we offer
* Working very closely with the operation teams, you can see clearly the impact of your own works everyday.
* We encourage rotating between projects, and learning new technologies, so there will be a lot of chances to learn.
* Flexible working schedule, apart from a few (only a few) scheduled in-person meetings with team, you can decide on your own time and place to work. Our team members can work at the office, coffee shop, at home, when they can be most productive.

## How to join
If you think you have what it takes, then simply send us your CV and cover letter to get started: talent@christinas.vn or apply directly through our website: https://www.christinas.vn/joinus/

fields.title: Fetch - Tester (Junior) - HCM - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* 42B Ho Ba Phan Street, Phuoc Long A Ward, District 9.

* Full-time. (Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 18:00).

## Salary Expectation

  * From $400 - $800.

## Job Description

The project is about an online marketplace for Advertisement spaces.

What is so cool about us is that we want to reinvent the way people see and use spaces, turning all the Available Idle spaces into Rentable advertising space! We hope that through this, everyone can have better use of idle space and access to affordable marketing! 

We have a platform for anyone to list available “AIR-spaces” and for anyone to book them for advertisement placements. What is an AIR-space? It is any public facing space. Cafes interior, tables, shop windows, car fleets, toilets.. You name it!

The project is creating a marketplace that allows businesses (AIR-space Owners) to maximize underutilises spaces they have, to help businesses (Advertisers) with the opportunity to reach out to their customers at a more affordable cost.

We hope to empower businesses of all sizes to stay competitive in the market place by fostering mutual support amongst non competing businesses through win-win opportunities; everyone gets more value with the available existing resources.

## Responsibilities: 
  * Execute manual and write automated tests and identify actionable bugs quickly.
  * Manage QA coverage of multiple environment.
  * Planning/organizing necessary test passes, staying on top of all important issues, help triaging bugs and driving issues to resolutions and keeping everyone aware of QA status.
  * Work with different team (Engineering/PM/Operation) to collect necessary information to assure the QA coverage, and also provide feedback on quality issues.
  * Work with team to set their priorities and remove their roadblocks to make sure sufficient coverage is done for the release.
  * Create and support test dashboards/reports.

## Skills Requirements
  * BA/BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science, IT, or related field.
  * At least 2 years Quality Assurance experience in testing web.
  * Ability to construct test cases and get them prioritized based on changes.
  * Experience in stress test.
  * Knowledge of test and tool development methodology.
  * Experience in coding.
  * Communication skills, including development of presentations.

## Why it would be awesome to work with us
  * Attractive salary and annual salary review.
  * Working in a professional, friendly, well-equipped environment both with foreigners and Vietnamese.
  * Working directly with foreign client, all your dedication to work will be fairly recognized for performance review.
  * Extensive on job training, you will always have chance to work with new emerging technologies.
  * Social insurance, health insurance & unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law.
  * 12-day annual leave per year.
  * 13th month salary.
  * Enjoy diversified activities: Happy time every day, Monthly Team-building, Company trip, Play Game (PlayStation, CS Go), Play Sport (Football, Badminton...).
### What we offer:
  * Be part of an incredible team of people from all over the world.
  * Work in a rapidly expanding team and grow your responsibilities in time.
  * Immense learning opportunity in Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies.
  * Competitive salary, motivation package, and all kinds of small perks to keep you happy with us.
  * An environment that encourages self-development, learning, and growth.
  * “Work hard, play hard” culture - regular team events from skiing weekends and trekking to happy-hours and board game nights.

fields.title: Parcel Perform - Front-end Lead Engineer - Saigon - FT
fields.description:
## Location

* Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $2,000 - 3,000

## Requirements
* Be responsible with task and be open to discuss, give questions to build up products with high
quality and rich front-end experiences for our users.
* Understand clearly about object-oriented programming and design pattern.
* Willing to learn and research new technology or jump out of your comfort zone.
* Passionate about quality and the design of the code, productivity of the work and maintainability of the end result.
* Lead teammates to successfully deliver team outcome.

## Skills
* 3+ years professional front-end software development experience in Reactjs, or similar platforms.
* Have strong knowledge in ES5/ES6.
* Experience at one or more CSS compiler (LESS/SASS/PostCSS)
* Proficient in code review, code refactoring, Unit Testing
* Prefer for additional skills
-- Bundle code with Webpack/Browserify
-- AMP-HTML
-- Progressive web app (PWA)
-- Implementing a ChatBot
-- RxJS/Reactive programming
* Experienced in leading any team

### Must Have
* Experience in Reactjs, or similar platforms
* Leading skillset

### Responsibilities

As a frontend lead engineer, you will lead a team building the interfaces to interact with Parcel Perform system. Our goal has always been to create a seamless experience between human and computer. And because of that, we continuously incorporate latest advancement in web technologies and expand the scope of user interface. Some of the latest additions are conversational UI, Progressive Web App, and Accelerated Mobile Page.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
* The opportunity to work in a fast-growing, super exciting and innovative business that will revolutionize the e-commerce logistics industry.
* The ability to continuously learn and develop in an international setting with you being a critical driver behind the success of us achieving our mission.
* An environment where everybody never stops growing, and focuses on succeeding - we
continuously work with you on your strengths and weaknesses across many important
dimensions, and look at ways for you to address them and further your development
* Your entry ticket into being part of the Parcel Perform startup Universe, where you will work with and alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.
* All the usual perks you’d expect from a fast-growing company like competitive salary, extra insurance, free lunch, free fruit, snacks, cool oﬃce, team bonding events, various training programs, and more.

### Interesting engineering projects
You will be the needle of success on the growth of a global product that will become a key platform behind successful e-commerce logistics worldwide.

### Contact
Homepage: www.parcelperform.com
Mr. Huy - HR Manager - huy@parcelperform.com (+84 906 05 4484)
